block.p: Holliston Hill, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. John R. Hill of Hendersonville, N.C., was married there yesterday to Christopher Hurd, a son of Peter K. Hurd of Huntington Bay, L.I., and Imogene Hurd of West Islip, L.I. The Rev. Paul Stricklin performed the Episcopal service at the Chapel of the Transfiguration.
Mrs. Hurd manages the New York office of Hill Financial Corporation, a money-management firm with headquarters in Hendersonville of which her father is chairman. She graduated from Simmons College.

Holliston Hill, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. John R. Hill of Hendersonville, N.C., was married there yesterday to Christopher Hurd, a son of Peter K. Hurd of Huntington Bay, L.I., and Imogene Hurd of West Islip, L.I. The Rev. Paul Stricklin performed the Episcopal service at the Chapel of the Transfiguration.
Mrs. Hurd manages the New York office of Hill Financial Corporation, a money-management firm with headquarters in Hendersonville of which her father is chairman. She graduated from Simmons College.

Mr. Hurd is an assistant vice president of Garban Securities, a New York securities brokerage. He graduated from St. Lawrence University. His mother teaches English at West Islip High School. His father is the president of Sunrise Outdoor Advertising in Huntington Bay.
